Name: Ossified Ax
Description: A wide, sharp blade, formed by bones.

DescriptionLocalization.es: Hoja ancha y afilada, formada por huesos.
DescriptionLocalization.ko: 뼈에 의해 형성된 넓고 날카로운 칼날.
DescriptionLocalization.de: Eine breite, scharfe Klinge, die aus Knochen besteht.
DescriptionLocalization.fr: Une lame large et tranchante, formée d'os.
DescriptionLocalization.hu: Széles, éles penge, amelyet csontok alkotnak.
DescriptionLocalization.it: Una lama larga e affilata, formata da ossa.
DescriptionLocalization.ja: 骨で形成された幅広で鋭い刃。
DescriptionLocalization.pt: Uma lâmina larga e afiada, formada por ossos.
DescriptionLocalization.tr: Kemiklerden oluşan geniş, keskin bir bıçak.
DescriptionLocalization.zh: 由骨头形成的宽而锋利的刀片。
